content.query:
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[SP_LoadLink_Notification_Business]    Script Date: 12/22/2022 5:14:13 AM ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO

SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO


CREATE OR ALTER   PROCEDURE [dbo].[SP_LoadLink_Notification_Business]
(
@GetNewWaterMark bit=0,@RowValidFrom Datetime2(7)='1900-01-01 00:00:00.0000000'
)
AS
Begin 
	IF @GetNewWaterMark>0
	BEGIN
	SELECT isnull(max(RowValidFrom),@RowValidFrom) AS RowValidFrom
			FROM [dbo].[ws_notification]
			WHERE CAST(RowValidFrom As datetime2(7))>@RowValidFrom
	END
	ELSE
WITH CTE_Connections AS (

SELECT [record1id]                      AS 'Notification ID',
                [record2id]                      AS 'Business ID',
                [record2roleidname]              AS 'Role',
                record2id_entitytype             AS 'EntityType',
				isnull([description],'')         As 'Description',
                Row_number()
                  OVER (
                    partition BY id
                    ORDER BY versionnumber DESC) AS ROW_RUM
         FROM   [dbo].[connection] Conn
         WHERE  record1id_entitytype = 'ws_notification'
                AND record2id_entitytype = 'account'
				AND  CAST(Conn.RowValidFrom as datetime2(7)) > @RowValidFrom
         UNION
         SELECT [id]                             AS 'Notification ID',
                [ws_primarypcbu]                 AS 'Business ID',
                'Primary PCBU'                   AS 'Role',
                'account'                        AS 'EntityType',
				''                               As 'Description',
                Row_number()
                  OVER (
                    partition BY id
                    ORDER BY versionnumber DESC) AS ROW_RUM
         FROM   [dbo].[ws_notification] a
         WHERE  [ws_primarypcbu_entitytype] = 'account' and [ws_primarypcbu] IS NOT NULL
		 AND  CAST(a.RowValidFrom as datetime2(7)) > @RowValidFrom 
     AND a.RowIsCurrent='true'
	)
	   	SELECT  
		[notification id] as [NotificationID],
       [Business ID] as [BusinessID],
       role as Role,
	   EntityType,
	   Description
      FROM   CTE_Connections Conn
    WHERE  row_rum = 1 

    UNION 

    SELECT 
    'UNKNOWN',
    'UNKNOWN',
    Null,
    Null,
    NUll

	End
GO
